page.title: 15LEGENDS
page.content: A girl was said to have heard hounds but was afraid so retreated.That night a man was walking home and it is believed that he saw them.The hounds flew through the air , so are also {known as "the flying hounds."They apparently flew overhead like geese only twice the size,and yelped and called as they swept on southwards.One legend tells us about{"Dead Woman's {Thorn."It is said a lady hung herself on a Thorn tree and has haunted the neighbourhood since. The hut is called "Dead Woman's Thorn" and is haunted and has a red cross on the door.It is old and dates from the time of the Black Death .Nobody goes there anymore because of the legend .In the time 1847 -1893 a fair was held on Midsummer's day . On Midsummer's eve {Fairies dance on the hill
